alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Calcasieu; Jefferson Davis; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 18 at 1:30PM CST until December 18 at 2:30PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jefferson Davis Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Eastern Beauregard Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Central Calcasieu Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Vernon Parish in west central Louisiana... Allen Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 230 PM CST. * At 130 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of De Ridder to near Edgerly, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, De Ridder, Westlake, Vinton, Elizabeth, Reeves, Dry Creek, Moss Bluff, Sugartown, De Quincy, Ragley, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Mittie, Grant, Topsy, Lebleu Settlement, Gillis, Edgerly and Leblanc. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 11 and 42. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Calcasieu; Jefferson Davis; Vernon
